$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open.caption: {{$:/language/SideBar/Open/Caption}}

$:/plugins/TWaddle/TiddlerSets/readme.text:
[[TiddlerSets|$:/plugins/TWaddle/TiddlerSets]] lets you take "snapshots" of the current tiddler river and reopen these same tiddlers at a later time. ''Use''
In the __page toolbar__, click the
{{$:/plugins/TWaddle/TiddlerSets/icon}}
icon to take the "snapshot" which creates a //new// tiddler - a TiddlerSet tiddler - that has a `list` field with the current tiddler river titles. You can freely rename the created tiddler and add content to it. In the __sidebar lists__ you'll see TiddlerSet titles with a prefixing
{{$:/plugins/TWaddle/TiddlerSets/icon}}
icon. ''This is a button'' (yes, unconventional position). Clicking it closes all current tiddlers in the river only to reopen that set of tiddlers. If you only click the TiddlerSet //title//, it opens like any tiddler. ''Notes''
For the counters to function, titles must not contain the `'` character.
TiddlerSets overwrites $:/core/ui/SideBar/Open
$:/plugins/TWaddle/TiddlerSets/readme.title: $:/plugins/TWaddle/TiddlerSets/readme

$:/plugins/TWaddle/TiddlerSets/ViewTempl.text:
\define toggle-style(field, value, not:"") <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$text text={{{ [[$:/plugins/TWaddle/TiddlerSets/Stylesheet/toggles]$not$contains:$field$[$value$]then[â˜]else[ðŸ—¹]] }}} /> <$action-listops $tiddler="$:/plugins/TWaddle/TiddlerSets/Stylesheet/toggles" $field="$field$" $subfilter="+[toggle[$value$]]" /> \end <$list filter="""[all[current]tag[TiddlerSet]]""">
 Neither this framed part, nor the special tag, are printed.   <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="outline:1px solid silver; padding:2px 4px;"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/StoryList" list={{!!list}} /> <$action-navigate $to=<>/> {{$:/plugins/TWaddle/TiddlerSets/icon}} Close all open tids and open this tiddler set.
Toggle:   <> Counter   <> Titles   <> Tools   <> Subtitles   <> Tags
!!list (drag to reorder)
<$vars curr=<>> <$macrocall $name=list-links-draggable tiddler=<> itemTemplate="$:/plugins/TWaddle/TiddlerSets/itemTemplate"/> 		<$list filter={{!!list}}>
Directly edit items `tags` and `notes`
tags:
notes:		 <$edit-text field=tags class="tiddlersets-list-table-editor" placeholder=tags/>
<$edit-text field=notes class="tiddlersets-list-table-editor" placeholder=notes/>
Freely add text in the current tiddler (<>) to use it as an "intro" for the tiddler set.
$:/plugins/TWaddle/TiddlerSets/ViewTempl.title: $:/plugins/TWaddle/TiddlerSets/ViewTemplate

$:/plugins/TWaddle/TiddlerSets/TimeLine.text:
\whitespace trim \define titlelink() <$link/> \define timeline-title() <$list filter="""[tag[TiddlerSet]]""" emptyMessage=<> > <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink tc-sidebar-lists tiddlersets-navigate-btn" style="color:#999999" tooltip={{!!list}} actions="""<$action-navigate $to=<>/>"""> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/StoryList" list={{!!list}}/> {{$:/plugins/TWaddle/TiddlerSets/icon}} <$link to={{!!title}} class="foo"><$view field=title/> \end \define timeline(limit:"100",format:"DDth MMM YYYY",subfilter:"",dateField:"modified")
<$list filter="[!is[system]$subfilter$has[$dateField$]!sort[$dateField$]limit[$limit$]eachday[$dateField$]]">
<$view field="$dateField$" format="date" template="$format$"/> <$list filter="[sameday:$dateField${!!$dateField$}!is[system]$subfilter$!sort[$dateField$]]">
<>
\end <>
$:/plugins/TWaddle/TiddlerSets/TimeLine.title: $:/plugins/TWaddle/TiddlerSets/TimeLine
